editor.label: Application server - IIS getvirtualdirectories
editor.description: This procedure returns basic information for all virtual directories defined for the web site (recursively). This procedure is primarily for gathering information rather than performing specific actions.

formElement.label: Host Name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the host name of the IIS server. If the procedure is run on the host itself use 'localhost', the default value.

formElement.label: Web site ID:
formElement.documentation: The WebSiteID parameter must be the numeric internal identifier from the server's MetaBase information. The default value is 1.
